title: FreezeAtTime (Method)
text:
METHOD FreezeAtTime :
Error
Issue an freeze at time request for the object group

rows.Name: noAck
rows.Comment: donât ask for application layer response

rows: address qualifier, must be all,or 8/16 bit start/stop
time in UTC to perform freeze
time interval to perfrom periodic freezes (milliseconds)
start point if qualifier is 8/16 bit start/stop
stop point if qualifier is 8/16 bit start/top or quantityif qualifier is 8/16 bit limited quantity

if true automatically read the object group whenfreeze command is complete.
NOTE: if device supports events this should be set to
false to prevent reading all of the object groupâs data in addition to
receiving its events.
